name: Tank Warz! Demo
detailed_description:
Tank Warz! is an arcade shooter game, with a "modern retro" look and feel. We're still working on the full game development, but we liked the idea of showing it off at an early stage, so we decided to release it as a playable demo, just like it used to be!

Your mission is simple: Destroy the enemy tanks as they spawn at the Spawn Portals, and see how long you can last, and how high you can score before they destroy you!

This playable demo is the base gameplay, and features 2 pickup items: Health Packs and "Insta-Bombs" (dropped at random when an enemy tank is destroyed). We're working on adding more of these things into the full game. Also features 11 different 8-bit chip-tune style backing tracks for you to choose from.

Control Keys:

Move/Turn: WASD or CURSOR KEYS
Rotate Turret: MOUSE LEFT/RIGHT
Shoot: LEFT MOUSE BUTTON or CTRL KEYS
Pause/Unpause: P
Change Music Track: M (11 different 8-bit style tracks!)
Main Menu: ESC (with confirmation dialogue box so you don't accidentally lose your score)

We hope you enjoy this sample of the coming soon full game, please keep an eye on our store page for updates!

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 845M or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
